title: League Launcher won't install on windows 10.
body:
Weird. I wanted to reinstall League and I keep getting this even though I have DirectX 12 installed.
Any help?
http://i.prntscr.com/CcaGAZoySQ6y183k-AtWAA.png

replies.body: Double check that you've got all the right files by checking for DX 9 specifically. League might be searching for specific files related to DX9 that just aren't there for the DX 12 installation. If that's not getting it, you may need to reinstall those drivers with admin rights for them to work correctly.

Even though you have DX12, you might not actually have some needed files from Dx9, and for this reason you should keep all three versions of DX up to date.

You can find the download link here: https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/download/details.aspx?id=34429
It should fix your issue.
